description: The Man Rowing Boat, Type-1-2 emoji is a sequence of the  Rowboat,  Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-1-2, ? Male Sign and ? Variation Sel
apple_vendor_description: The man rowing a boat emoji on Apple devices features a dynamic scene with a man, rendered in a light skin tone, actively engaged in rowing. Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting highlight the movement of the oars and the gentle ripples on the water, creating a sense of effort and adventure. This emoji beautifully captures the spirit of outdoor activity, teamwork, or perseverance, perfect for conveying a journey or a shared effort in messages on Apple devices.
